title: PerfMiner Visualizer
description: A web tool that uses software visualization techniques to help developers and architects to analyze the evolution of the performance quality attribute, in terms of execution time, for different software versions.

title: Holter DevOps
description: A Web tool that collect and analyze DevOps metrics. To assess the maturity of DevOps adoption

title: Snooper
description: Snooper is a project to miner data from APIs of repositories like GitHub API, TravisCI API, Coveralls API, etc.

title: Gauge CI
description: A library to calculate CI sub-practices values.

title: CI workflows Trader
description: ci-workflows-trader is a project to identify CI related GHActions workflows
